item.description: Fights in tier: P9S - Kokytos P10S - Pandæmonium P11S - Themis P12S - Athena General Tier Info

Welcome to DESU! What is DESU? DESU is a community aiming to build up the Party Finder experience on Dynamis, and to provide a wealth of resources for everyone looking to tackle any and all of the high-end combat content this game has to offer - together.

item.title: P7S - Adgistis
item.description: Encounter Info DPS Check 58.6k Enrage 11:13 Drops Chest One Chest Two 1 coffer randomly selected from the following 1 Leg coffer - Head Tome armor upgrade - Hand Tome weapon upgrade - Foot Strategy Reference Position Setup Blades of Attis Forbidden Fruit 1 Bough of Attis For this, the red debuff indicates a point-blank AoE that needs to be spread, and the blue debuff indicates a stack marker.

item.title: P8S - Hephaistos
item.description: Encounter Info DPS Check Part I: 59.8k Part II: 64.8k Enrage Part I: 7:52 Part II: 8:26 Drops Chest One Chest Two 1 coffer randomly selected from the following 2 unique coffers randomly selected from the following Strategy Reference PART I Illusory Creation/Manifold Flames OR Two possible patterns for this, priority is based on your corner partners (so, if your corner is NW, you would go either north or west).
